Text:
I forgot to mention that you need to Load the included amps and presets into the Guitar Rig 2 when opening the plugin for the first time.

Also if you have an Intel-Mac make sure your "Host" or Recording Software also has Universal Binary or else this plugin will not work.
The Guitar Rig 2 plug-in needs a Host with a Universal Binary to run it properly.
